name: Marching Cubes (MoreMagical)
description:
A puzzle game made as an entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 called Marching Cubes. Marching Cubes is a puzzle game where you are limited by the amount if inputs you have. That's also the play on the theme "Out of Control".

The game features 5 tutorial levels, and a level editor to make custom levels. Due to the fact that i am working solo, i have called it here since i do really need some sleep. 

There may still be some bugs, i haven't found out yet. If you encounter any, please let me know and i will look into hotfixing it.

Sound effects used are from a pack i bought a while ago, and i used a few assets from Kenney (such as the door and the flag). The rest of the assets are made during this jam.

Note. Project was entirely made in HDRP, and i found out at the last minute that HDRP does not support WEBGL, so i made a rushed switch to URP. That's why the screenshots look slightly different than the final game (with main difference being more bloom). 

Bugs noted: 

Star rating system being totally broken - STATUS: fixed but still not great.
